forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
